ai-patthana8.33:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.33:1.1_0: We haven’t learned this for the next,, not the sake of ever.
ai-patthana8.33:3.1_0: Experiential confidence in the teaching, for the sake of a park,
ai-patthana8.33:4.1_0: One does not associated with those states of (wholesome) associated with it,
ai-patthana8.33:4.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.33:5.1_0: ... five objects the results of the universal objects ...
ai-patthana8.33:6.1_0: Not long afterwards, or fortnight, or for teaching, or for those who are next.
ai-patthana8.33:6.1_1: One does not give rise to confidence in those without it or increase the same teaching.
ai-patthana8.33:6.1_2: or delight in heaven or the next.
ai-patthana8.33:7.1_0: Not for the sake of another, or for the sake of the whole, or for the opposite sex, there is no cause or reason for the sake of a relishing.
ai-patthana8.33:8.1_0: Not long afterwards, or both; and they don’t give rise to a loved ones or the next.
ai-patthana8.33:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.33:10.1_0: Not for the sake of deceitfulness, and for those who don’t love it, for those who enjoy it. This is the cause of reason why they don’t give rise to unhappy causes.
ai-patthana8.33:10.1_1: Not for the sake of deceitfulness, and for the sake of obstinate causes another to be given up by conjunction. This is a condition for the sake of contemplation.
ai-patthana8.33:10.1_2: They don’t neglect things they’re not attached to others, nor are they attached to their own thoughts. They don’t lose their territory. They don’t give rise to unattached to causes and reasons.
ai-patthana8.33:11.1_0: Not for the sake of deceitfulness, and for the sake of another, they don’t give rise to for the sake of fondness.
ai-patthana8.33:12.1_0: Not for the sake of another or for those who don’t love it or for those who enjoy it, and for those who don’t love it. Because of the Dhamma they’re not attached to it, seeing causes and reasons to give rise to causes.
ai-patthana8.33:14.1_0: The chapter on the ground is finished.
